msg: Fixed scrollborder failing if content has either no width or no height.

author: dave_slaughter
msg: add AboutType to no-application-library so about methods can tell why they are called
add ClassStrategy to no-reflector to allow changes to which classes are considered value objects, which ones are not allowed etc.

author: dave_slaughter
msg: add a strategy to the JavaIntrospector to determine which classes can be used for fields, which are value classes etc
